org.bubblecloud.zigbee.network.discovery

Class EndpointBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.bubblecloud.zigbee.network.discovery.EndpointBuilder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable, Stoppable

    public class EndpointBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
implements Stoppable
    This class implements the Thread that completes the discovery of the node found either by AssociationNetworkBrowser or AnnounceListenerImpl by inspecting the Node and then the End Point on the node.

    Before discovery, the ZigBeeNode is created.

    The initial discovery requests the node descriptors from the device. These are only available at device level (ie not for each endpoint). These are simply stored in the node class for later use.

    After this the endpoints are queried and generated. The inspection of each End Point leads to the creation of ZigBeeEndpoint.

    If no endpoints are found on the device, the ZigBeeNode is removed from the nodes list.

    Since:
    0.1.0
    Author:
    Stefano "Kismet" Lenzi, Francesco Furfari, Manlio Bacco, Chris Jackson
